page.title: 01HILLINGDON SAILING BASE
page.content: The sailing base is situated up a small country lane off Harvil road. Harvil road is the road that goes to Harefield.You can catch a number 128 bus to get there from Uxbridge station or the appropiate bus stop.There are many different sailing clubs at the base,one of which is called the Abbotsfield sailing club.It costs Â£15 to be a member for 1 year.If you are a non_member then a child has to pay Â£1.50 and adults Â£2.50. Here are a few of the sailing crafts at the base_canoes, motor boats, yachts, lightweight racing boats, speed boats.Wind_surfing is also available.The main office at the base is a small log cabin where you pay or show your membership card.You can also enquire about joining one of the many different sailing clubs.There is a wooden store building where all
